opennlp.tools.coref.resolver

Class ResolverUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • opennlp.tools.coref.resolver.ResolverUtils

  • public class ResolverUtils
extends Object
    This class provides a set of utilities for turning mentions into normalized strings and features.
